message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000.  I believe this reflects the immense benefits it offers.

Alice, while I appreciate the opportunity to acquire this product, the initial price of $1,600,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm willing to offer $1,100,000 for the product, reflecting its value and considering my financial constraints.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your position, however, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $1,450,000 is still outside my financial constraints. To make this deal work, I'm willing to offer $1,200,000. This price recognizes the value of the product while staying within my budget.
